mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FAVORITES ( FAVOR_ID, USER_ID, FAVOR_TYPE_CD, TARGET_ID, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_ID, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_FAVOR_ID.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{favorTypeCd}, #{targetId}, SYSDATE, #{userId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SYSDATE, #{userId, jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.select: SELECT f.FAVOR_ID as favorId, f.USER_ID as userId, f.FAVOR_TYPE_CD as favorTypeCd, f.TARGET_ID as targetId, TO_CHAR(f.CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as createdDate, TO_CHAR(f.UPDATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as updatedDate, CASE WHEN f.FAVOR_TYPE_CD = 'FAVOR_02' THEN NVL(s.STATION_NAME, '충전소명 없음') WHEN f.FAVOR_TYPE_CD = 'FAVOR_04' THEN NVL(a.ACCOM_NAME, '숙소명 없음') ELSE '알 수 없는 타입: ' || f.FAVOR_TYPE_CD END as targetName, CASE WHEN f.FAVOR_TYPE_CD = 'FAVOR_02' THEN NVL(s.STATION_ADDRESS, '주소 없음') WHEN f.FAVOR_TYPE_CD = 'FAVOR_04' THEN NVL(a.ACCOM_ADDRESS, '주소 없음') ELSE '' END as targetAddress FROM TB_FAVORITES f LEFT JOIN TB_STATION s ON (f.FAVOR_TYPE_CD = 'FAVOR_02' AND f.TARGET_ID = s.STATION_ID) LEFT JOIN TB_ACCOMMODATION a ON (f.FAVOR_TYPE_CD = 'FAVOR_04' AND f.TARGET_ID = a.ACCOM_ID) WHERE f.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY f.CREATED_DATE DESC
